name: Titanoboa
description: The Titanoboa is a colossal snake, possessing exceptional brute strength. It has armored scales and a menacing presence, with a muscular body capable of constricting and swallowing its prey.
memorable: Its ability to stun enemies with its scales and powerful grappling attacks makes it a terrifying predator.
goals: Hunting for large prey and establishing dominance in its territory.
relations: It can be encountered in areas with other large wildlife and may dominate smaller predators.
environment: Typically found in jungles and swamps, thriving in lush, humid environments.
strengths: Powerful bite and constricting attacks allow it to deal significant damage and control opponents.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity limits its agility and maneuverability in combat.
attacks: Multiattack allows it to strike with two bite attacks or one bite and one constrict, dealing substantial piercing and bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Sparkling Scales can stun creatures, providing opportunities for the Titanoboa to attack without retaliation.
senses: Blindsight allows it to perceive its surroundings within 10 feet.
skills: Its perception skills grant it a fair ability to notice details.
additional_information: Can slither through tight spaces if it has not eaten a huge creature recently.
Swallow ability inflicts ongoing acid damage to swallowed enemies.
Grapples opponents with its constricting attack, rendering them restrained.
Strong body contributes to high hit points.
Exceptional strength modifier of +8 enables powerful melee attacks.
test_queries: large serpent that swallows its prey
